DDescription.description: Filter an iterator by an attribute of the contained objects Output is a new iterator
Name of the Attribute to check (Pipeline dictionary notation)
Regular expression. Used for mode: - Matches - Containes
Set wether to include matching or not matching entries

Matching made be done in different modes: - Equals: The value ist equal (Object.equal()) - Matches: The string representation of the value matches a regular expression - Containes: The string representation of the value contains a regular expression - InMap: The value is contained in the keys of a Map - CollectionContains: The value is contained in a Collection

DDescription.value: Compares to regular expression complete matching
Compares to regular expression partial matching
Compareable value is contained in Collection found at [Attribute]

DDescription.description: The input Iterator, which contains the elements to filter
The regular expression. If not set, the configuration parameter is used as default Used only for mode: - Matches - Contains

The value used to compare, different types for diffenet modes: - Equals: Any Object - Matches: A String, any Object (toString() is used) - Containes: A String, any Object (toString is used) - InMap: A Map - CollectionContains: A Collection
